extendedInfo.description: Eye In Sky Weather is for those who like their weather clean, simple and beautiful.The app includes 14 of the best weather icon sets available, with the ability to add your own icon sets.Four widgets and an expandable notification are available which are highly customizable.Also has a DashClock extension.A pro key is available to remove ads and support development :)Enjoy!

reviews.title: Great.
reviews.comment: Great widget. Would love the ability to show current weather on the 4x1 widget and perhaps only 3 day forecast, not 5. Would be then a perfect 5 stars.
reviews.author: Jonathan Martin

reviews.title: Simply Amazing.
reviews.comment: This app is simple, pretty, and still gives you useful weather information. A great example of how an app should be simple and still get the job done.
reviews.author: Andrew Nguyen

reviews.title: Great weather app
reviews.comment: I really like this weather app. Feels lightweight, nice to look at, accurate info.
reviews.author: Jaycee Imperial

reviews.title: Best weather app I\'ve used
reviews.comment: The interface is beautiful, functional, and easy to use. I don\'t plan on using any other app for a very long time. I highly recommend this app, just because it has the best interface of any weather app on Android.
reviews.author: Shishir Tandale

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.comment: Simple, clear, user friendly. It is fantastic.
reviews.author: Becky H

reviews.title: Simply beautiful
reviews.comment: Great stylish app, vastly customisable. A perfect weather app.
reviews.author: Paul Rowell

reviews.title: It\'s okay
reviews.comment: Pros: customizable taskbar icon. Has radar capability. Shows forecasts.  Cons: location doesn\'t update often (like weather Channel) and isn\'t often too accurate, no radar (and no radar widget). Other thoughts: fix these issues and I\'d gladly donate.
reviews.author: Raul E. Fernandez

reviews.title: nice app but accuracy is off
reviews.comment: For today, the app indicates the chance of rain is Morning: 20%, Afternoon: 28%, Evening: 21%, For the Day: 43%  Looking at the NOAA website, the chance of rain from 8am - 12midnight is 50% 53% 57% 60% 63% 67% 70% 71% 72% 73% 74% 74% 75% 71% 67% 63% 58%  Not sure where the app is getting it\'s data from.
reviews.author: Jason Christian

reviews.title: simple, clean and good weather overview
reviews.comment: simple, clean, nice to look at and good weather overview.  Could use some more forecast days in the program (not widget) - perharps a slide function? Forecast widget could be nice with current and 3-4 days forecast
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: \"Feels like\" not working
reviews.comment: Regardless of humidity \"feels like\" (humidex) always shows the same as the current temperature.  Which is wrong of course.
reviews.author: arabia d

reviews.title: Nice and easy
reviews.comment: Would request the developer to add an option to change the \'FONT STYLE\'(select a custom font from a list).   Overall Very nice weather widget.
reviews.author: Darryl Dmello

reviews.title: Unusable
reviews.comment: You have London England, but not cities within London? So it\'s not accurate weather prediction and GPS location doesn\'t track my location either.... so basically I can\'t use the widgets, what a shame
reviews.author: kami khan

reviews.title: Best weather app available... but...
reviews.comment: Amazing UI. Amazing widgets. A bug means it only updates every hour even if you choose to refresh manually. It would also be great to display the current location instead of the weather station location.
reviews.author: Robert Caldecott

reviews.title: Nice weather app
reviews.comment: I\'ve been using this app on my N4 and everything seems to work fine, the icons, the widgets are great. But sometimes the widget doesn\'t change when I refresh...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Almost perfect
reviews.comment: I\'m using this as a replacement for the standard Samsung weather widget. But until I can see the date and time on this, it gets only four stars
reviews.author: Ajith Sethuraman

reviews.title: Looks good
reviews.comment: But i only got celcious... And i can\'t put it on farienheit... Im not a genious to try to figure the difference...help me or ill have to unistall..other wise i would like it....
reviews.author: Christine Bailey

reviews.title: finally a clean, beautiful app
reviews.comment: I\'ve been looking for something like this for so long. This isn\'t trying to imitate other apps and has it\'s own personality. Beautiful app and widgets!
reviews.author: Shawn Sepehry

reviews.title: Cleanest weather app
reviews.comment: This is the only weather app that I can use for a widget. So clean looking and always gives me correct information. Would highly recommend to anyone!
reviews.author: Mitchell Hale

reviews.title: Uninstalled.
reviews.comment: I just Uninstalled this app  bc we have thunderstorms approaching right now and there is no radar in this app. I need to know when to head to the basement!!!
reviews.author: Kelly Hanratty

reviews.title: Looks great and works well.
reviews.comment: I love weather apps and this one looks really good. It picked up my location without GPS or any input from me. I was a little confused about how to change the icon set as check box wasn\'t immediately visible, but sorted that out. I will certainly be upgrading to the pro version.
reviews.author: James Pickering
